info.title: Navigate backwards to a spin button

setupScript.name: setFocusAfterSpinButtonAndSetPredefinedDate
setupScript.description: sets the date picker to March 19, 2021, hides the previous/next arrow buttons and sets focus on a link after the 'Year' spin button

user: With focus on the 'Navigate backwards from here' link, navigate to the 'Year' spin button.
instructions.raw: With focus on the 'Navigate backwards from here' link, navigate to the 'Year' spin button.
instructions.mode: Toggle Quick Nav OFF by pressing the Left Arrow and Right Arrow keys at the same time.

assertions.expectation: Name of the group is conveyed as: 'Choose a Date current value is Friday, March nineteenth, 2021'
